verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Rouse, then, soldiers,
rally round the banner,
ready, steady, pass the word along;

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: Christ is Captain of the mighty throng

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Sound the battle cry!
See, the foe is nigh;

raise the standard high
for the Lord;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Gird your armor on,
stand firm, every one;
rest your cause upon His holy word.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Strong to meet the foe,
marching on we go,

while our cause we know,
must prevail;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Shield and banner bright,
gleaming in the light;

battling for the right
we ne’er can fail.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
O! Thou God of all,
hear us when we call,

help us one and all
by Thy grace;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
When the battle’s done,
and the vict'ry's won,

may we wear the crown
before Thy face.
